mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point_history ( member_id, point_id, transaction_type, amount, balance_before, balance_after, order_number, description, created_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{pointId}, #{transactionType}, #{amount}, #{balanceBefore}, #{balanceAfter}, #{orderNumber}, #{description}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, point_id, transaction_type, amount, balance_before, balance_after, order_number, description, created_at FROM point_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, member_id, point_id, transaction_type, amount, balance_before, balance_after, order_number, description, created_at FROM point_history WHERE order_number = #{orderNumber} ORDER BY created_at DESC
